name: Natural Craft
description:
Control the falling blocks, stack them correctly, and clear lines by filling them.

Game Features:
  • Each type of block has unique feature, using each feature appropriately is the key to success.

  • Burn everything with flames! Always make sure the blocks are placed properly to avoid destroying everything with flames! Or burn them all!

  • Explosion is an art! Use bombs to save the situation from failure!

  • When you level up, more blocks will be unlocked.

  • Place blocks to collect energy. Each time you fill up your energy, you can exchange it for a powerful bomb!

  • Clear lines and level up. With each level up, the challenge increases in difficulty!
